price: Wen Allah rechtleitet, der ist (in Wahrheit) rechtgeleitet. Wen Er aber in die Irre gehen läßt, das sind die Verlierer.
arabic: مَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِيۖ وَمَن يُضۡلِلۡ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: man yahdi al-lahu fahuwa al-muh'tadī waman yuḍ'lil fa-ulāika humu al-khāsirūna
